snippet: A video showed the beheading of a journalist, Kenji Goto, killed a week after ISIS announced the killing of another Japanese hostage.
abstract: Islamic State releases video purportedly showing beheading of Japanese journalist Kenji Goto; video comes two days after Jordan fails to meet deadline set by ISIS to release prisoner Sajida al-Rishawi.

byline.contributor: Mohammad Ghannam contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon, and Martin Fackler from Tokyo.

lead_paragraph: A video showed the beheading of a journalist, Kenji Goto, killed a week after ISIS announced the killing of another Japanese hostage.

headline.main: ISIS Says It Has Killed 2nd Japanese Hostage
headline.print_headline: ISIS Says It Has Killed 2nd Japanese Hostage

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
